properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:45PM CST until January 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
...Winter Weather Advisory...

.There remains two separate pieces of the Winter Weather
Advisory. The first will span portions of the eastern Ozarks
until 6 PM this evening for Howell, Oregon, Texas, Shannon, and
Dent counties. There, periods of light to moderate snow will
continue into this afternoon. The second piece of the Winter
Weather Advisory goes into effect at 9 PM this evening for
counties generally along and north of the Highway 60 corridor.
This second piece will focus on a new swath of wintry weather
that is anticipated to spread across eastern Kansas and southwest
Missouri late tonight into Friday afternoon.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two
inches.

* WHERE...McDonald, Barry and Stone Counties.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to noon CST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST FRIDAY
